title: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes. JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d) etc.
OB: When opening the All types dialog, obfuscated classes are displayed in the listing.
EB: Obfuscated classes should be displayed with less prominence or filtered out from the listing.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the All types dialog. 
2. Observe the presence of obfuscated classes in the listing.
